casebody.data:
John LYNCH, an individual; and Kellie Fuhr, an individual, Appellants,
v.
Yehia AWADA, an individual; and Tyche Entertainment, LLC, a dissolved Nevada limited liability corporation, Respondents. No. 72873 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED SEPTEMBER 28, 2018

AFFIRMED IN PART. REVERSED IN PART. REMAND.
